quickinstantcommons-missinghandler: An error message. $2 is the repository name: "Wikimedia Commons" in a default setup, a different name, or the generic message {{msg-mw|Quickinstantcommons-shared-repo}}.
quickinstantcommons-shared-repo: A generic name shown in {{msg-mw|Quickinstantcommons-missinghandler}} if nothing else is defined.
